nodes.text: Full of Sith is a Star Wars podcast hosted by Bryan Young, contributor to StarWars.com; Amy Ratcliffe, contributor to StarWars.com, Star Wars Insider, IGN.com, and Nerdist.com; and Mike Pilot, with semi-regular appearances from Portland Mercury editor Bobby Roberts, who hosts the spoiler-focused spinoff "Rumor Control". The show features stories, interviews, and segments that revolve around all aspects of Star Wars and Star Wars fandom. Cast members, Lucasfilm representatives, journalists, and notable fans regularly appear on the show, including Stephen J. Sansweet, Dee Bradley Baker, Matt Lanter, Tom Kane, Ashley Eckstein, James Arnold Taylor, Sam Witwer, Dave Filoni, Greg Weisman, John Jackson Miller, David Prowse, Peter Mayhew, Billy Dee Williams, and the entire cast of Star Wars Rebels, amongst many others.
